changelog:
Added:
• `WEAPON_PETROLCAN` to default not logged in config.
• Fire count to shooting logs to stop the spam a bit more.
• Check for screenshot webhook setup.
• Option to set names for explotion types in `server/explotions.lua`
• Option to include ESX jobs, charachter names and player money in logs (This is BETA and not tested on all esx versions.)
Removed:
• `DIR_WATER_HYDRANT` from explotion logs.

Fixed:
• Issue with details not showing on connect.

Changed:
• Reworked commands in the config to make it easier to understand.
